
Note that when we start an isochronous amdtp slave stream it already has to be
configured with the right rate, channels and so on!


https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/CodingStyle


CIP header:

  2     6     8    2     3     1     2     8
|00| sid | dbs | fn | qpc | sph | rsv | dbc |

        6                                 24
|10| fmt |                              fdf |


off    diff rx-cur rx-pre tx     tx
            syt    syt    syt    cycle
# 44k1

46802  4458 0xc12a 0xa7c0 0xf2d2 0xb
